body:
Hey guys, back again with another spotlight. If you want one of your own, fill out the application format here: https://goo.gl/forms/f9XjcBVJ5vMl72bZ2. Today's spotlightee is Eteh!

What is your username in Minecraft and what is your favourite game on Avicus?
My username is Eteh and my favourite gamemode is DTM/CTW.

Introduce yourself in 3-4 sentences.
Hi, I'm Eteh, or you can call me Gabriel. I've been around on Avicus for about 3 years now, and I'm currently a referee. I enjoy playing soccer as my favourite sport.

What are you the most excited/obsessed over at the moment?
Not much really, am excited for Apollo in the current tournament though.

What interests you the most in life?
Learning how to DJ, make music, cinematography, and generally travelling.

What music/art/media do you like?
I generally like EDM and remixes. I also love making cinematics and editing videos, for example my scrim videos on avicus which can be found on my channel (a little shameless plug here - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5UwrMZS36-RoY2Mvl0mJbw)

Where are you from?
Singapore

What do you spend most of your time doing while on Avicus?
Scrimming and playing pubs.

Anything else you want to mention?
{tag=cad8013ab98a40679f0981b0734e0085} got credits

title: Community Spotlights #17 - Eteh
